mapper.sql: title, created_at as createdAt, content, view_count as viewCount, comment_count as commentCount, like_count as likeCount, category, tag, user_id as userId
mapper.select: select free_board.id as id, , (select COUNT(*) FROM free_board where subject = #{subject}) AS totalRowCount, nick_name as writer from free_board join user on user.id = user_id WHERE subject = #{subject} order by created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board (user_id, content, title, writer, category, tag, subject) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{tag}, #{subject})
